original_text: All those that were numbered of the Levites, whom Moses and Aaron and the chief of Israel numbered, after their families, and after the house of their fathers,
korean_text: 모세와 아론과 이스라엘 지휘관들이 레위인을 그 종족과 조상의 가문에 따라 다 계수하니

sentences.original_text: All those that were numbered of the Levites
whom Moses and Aaron and the chief of Israel numbered
and after the house of their fathers
